text: For emails in HubSpot where they are using the drag and drop. Is it possible for the background color to be removed from the `<body>` tag? I know it's applied to that and the first wrapping table, but having it applied to the body means when someone clicks "reply" on the email, the background color is set so if its a darker color, they need to change it in their email in order to see what they are replying with

Quickone guys, Anyone know how to pull a portfolio element into another page or not. For example have the big portfolio list on one page then just have the recent tags pull into another page via the class name.
I guess it depends how you set up the portfolio. If it’s set up as a blog you just loop through the blog. If it’s a hubDB you loop through the hubDB in a custom module
The plan was just via a custom module
for example <http://info.tribalgroup.com/events-page-demo> then top ones pulling into a diffrent page

Hi all <!here>. We just released an updated version of the Follow Me module, which gives you all more flexibility and should hopefully streamline your work a bit. Check out more details here <https://designers.HubSpot.com/blog/in-beta-an-improved-more-dynamic-follow-me-module>
